bibl.title: Letter from William Crawford Gorgas to Robert M. O'Reilly, April 24, 1905

div1.p: Gorgas requests that Ira A. Shimer be assigned to the Sanitary Corps.

div1.head: Letter from William Crawford Gorgas to Robert M. O'Reilly, April 24, 1905
div1.opener:
ISTHMIAN CANAL ZONE
DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH
OFFICE OF CHIEF SANITARY OFFICER
ANCON, CANAL ZONE
April 24, 1905
Gen. R.M. O'Reilly,
Surgeon-General, U.S.A.,
Washington, D.C.
Dear General:-
div1.p:
I would probably for the present make him Chief of
the Medical Division at Ancon, but I would like such a man
as could do rough surgery and practice anywhere he might be
placed along the line. I do not care particularly for
executive ability. I mean executive ability is not a necessity
in this case. If Shimer is such a man please let me have him,
if not, give me some one else who you think would fill the
bill.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully yours, W.C. Gorgas.
Chief Sanitary Officer. 2284
